 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂפַק‎</span>] **verb** ==suffice== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָפַק‎</span> ***suffice, abound***, so [[Eccl.15.18|Eccl 15:18]] +; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפֵיק‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפַק‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be niggardly, scanty***, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1573</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂפֹּק‎</span> [[1Kgs.20.10|1Kgs 20:10]], subject dust, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> of thing.
